projects.title: Project 1
projects.description: A modern and responsive portfolio website built with React and Material-UI. This project is designed to present my professional experience, skills, and projects in a smooth, user-friendly, and visually appealing manner. It provides a seamless experience for visitors to explore my journey and contact me effortlessly.
